description.oldValue:
Organization-wide Search with search suggestions via Search Box in SharePoint, Office.com, and on Microsoft Search in Bing; People Answer and Customizable Bookmarks and Q&A Answers. Search Usage Analytics coming soon. Microsoft Graph connectors not included in this release.
GA date: August CY2022
description.newValue: Organization-wide Search with search suggestions via Search Box in SharePoint, Office.com, and on Microsoft Search in Bing; People Answer and Customizable Bookmarks and Q&A Answers. Search Usage Analytics coming soon. Microsoft Graph connectors not included in this release.
